00027 #include <stdio.h>
00028 #include <stdlib.h>
00029 #include <string.h>
00030 #include <unistd.h>

00032 #include "freenect_internal.h"
00033 
00034 int freenect_init(freenect_context **ctx, freenect_usb_context *usb_ctx)
00035 {
00036         *ctx = malloc(sizeof(freenect_context));
00037         if (!ctx)
00038                 return -1;
00039 
00040         memset(*ctx, 0, sizeof(freenect_context));
00041 
00042         return fnusb_init(&(*ctx)->usb, usb_ctx);
00043 }
00044 
00045 int freenect_shutdown(freenect_context *ctx)
00046 {
00047         printf("%s NOT IMPLEMENTED YET\n", __FUNCTION__);
00048         return 0;
00049 }
00050 
00051 int freenect_process_events(freenect_context *ctx)
00052 {
00053         return fnusb_process_events(&ctx->usb);
00054 }
00055 
00056 int freenect_num_devices(freenect_context *ctx)
00057 {
00058   libusb_device **devs; //pointer to pointer of device, used to retrieve a list of devices
00059   ssize_t cnt = libusb_get_device_list (ctx->usb.ctx, &devs); //get the list of devices
00060   if (cnt < 0)
00061     return (-1);
00062 
00063   int nr = 0, i = 0;
00064   struct libusb_device_descriptor desc;
00065   for (i = 0; i < cnt; ++i)
00066   {
00067     int r = libusb_get_device_descriptor (devs[i], &desc);
00068     if (r < 0)
00069       continue;
00070     if (desc.idVendor == MS_MAGIC_VENDOR && desc.idProduct == MS_MAGIC_CAMERA_PRODUCT)
00071       nr++;
00072   }
00073 
00074   libusb_free_device_list (devs, 1);  // free the list, unref the devices in it
00075 
00076         return (nr);
00077 }
00078 
00079 int freenect_open_device(freenect_context *ctx, freenect_device **dev, int index)
00080 {
00081         int res;
00082         freenect_device *pdev = malloc(sizeof(freenect_device));
00083         if (!pdev)
00084                 return -1;
00085 
00086         memset(pdev, 0, sizeof(*pdev));
00087 
00088         pdev->parent = ctx;
00089 
00090         res = fnusb_open_subdevices(pdev, index);
00091 
00092         if (res < 0) {
00093                 free(pdev);
00094                 return res;
00095         } else {
00096                 *dev = pdev;
00097                 return 0;
00098         }
00099 }
00100

00104         return 0;
00105 }

00107 void freenect_set_user(freenect_device *dev, void *user)
00108 {
00109         dev->user_data = user;
00110 }
00111 void *freenect_get_user(freenect_device *dev)
00112 {
00113         return dev->user_data;
00114 }
